Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • EV3Hardware.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for accessing static Robot resources

    • Field Detail

      • ANGLE_90_DEG

        public static final double ANGLE_90_DEG
        Actual value to get a physical rotation of 90 degrees. This value is used to correct the odometer's imprecision.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
